ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.*, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_relation r INNER JOIN mm_member m1 ON m1.id = r.member_id WHERE ({level_value}=-1 OR m1.level{level_comp}{level_value}) AND r.invi_member_id = m.id AND r.reg_merchant_id=rl.reg_merchant_id AND m1.reg_time BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{start_time}') AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{end_time}')) as invi_num, ((SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_relation r INNER JOIN mm_member m1 ON m1.id = r.member_id WHERE ({level_value}=-1 OR m1.level{level_comp}{level_value}) AND r.invi_member_id = m.id AND r.reg_merchant_id=rl.reg_merchant_id AND m1.reg_time BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{start_time}') AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{end_time}'))+ (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_relation r INNER JOIN mm_member m1 ON m1.id = r.member_id WHERE ({level_value}=-1 OR m1.level{level_comp}{level_value}) AND invi_member_id IN (SELECT member_id FROM mm_relation r INNER JOIN mm_member m1 ON m1.id = r.member_id WHERE ({level_value}=-1 OR m1.level{level_comp}{level_value}) AND r.invi_member_id = m.id AND r.reg_merchant_id=rl.reg_merchant_id AND m1.reg_time BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{start_time}') AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{end_time}')))) as all_num FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON m.id= rl.member_id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND state={state} ) t ORDER BY t.{sort_field},t.reg_time asc LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON m.id= rl.member_id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND state={state} AND m.reg_time BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{start_time}') AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP('{end_time}')
